snippet: Adm. Michael S. Rogers, the head of United States Cyber Command, said in Senate testimony that the country needed to increase its capacity for cyberattacks as a deterrent against hostile nations.
abstract: Adm Michael S Rogers, head of both National Security Agency and United States Cyber Command, tells Senate committee US must improve its ability to engage in cyberattacks, as deterrent against enemy nations.
lead_paragraph: Adm. Michael S. Rogers, the head of United States Cyber Command, said in Senate testimony that the country needed to increase its capacity for cyberattacks as a deterrent against hostile nations.

headline.main: U.S. Must Step Up Capacity for Cyberattacks, Chief Argues
headline.print_headline: U.S. Must Step Up Capacity for Cyberattacks, Chief Argues

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
